entry.def: If you say that you need or have a great deal of or a good deal of a particular thing, you are emphasizing that you need or have a lot of it.

example.ex: I am in a position to save you a good deal of time.
example.tran: 我能够为你节省许多时间。

entry.def: A deal of something is a lot of it.

example.ex: He had a deal of work to do.

entry.def: If you make a deal ,do a deal, or cut a deal, you complete an agreement or an arrangement with someone, especially in business.

example.ex: Japan will have to do a deal with America on rice imports...
example.tran: 日本将不得不与美国就大米的进口达成一笔交易。

example.ex: The two sides tried and failed to come to a deal...
example.tran: 双方都努力了，但还是没能达成协议。

entry.def: If a person, company, or shop deals in a particular type of goods, their business involves buying or selling those goods.

example.ex: ...the rights of our citizens to hold and to deal in foreign currency.
example.tran: 我们的公民持有和买卖外汇的权利

entry.def: If someone deals illegal drugs, they sell them.
If someone has had a bad deal, they have been unfortunate or have been treated unfairly.

example.ex: The people of Liverpool have had a bad deal for many, many years.
example.tran: 利物浦人多年来一直没有得到公正的待遇。

entry.def: If you deal playing cards, you give them out to the players in a game of cards.

example.ex: The croupier dealt each player a card, face down...
example.tran: 赌台管理员给每位玩家正面朝下发了一张牌。

example.ex: He once dealt cards in an illegal gambling joint.
example.tran: 他曾经在一个非法赌博点负责发牌。

entry.tran: 沉重打击;对…造成伤害（或损失）
entry.def: If an event deals a blow to something or someone, it causes them great difficulties or makes failure more likely.

example.ex: The summer drought has dealt a heavy blow to the government's economic record...
example.tran: 夏季的干旱已经对政府的经济业绩造成了沉重打击。

example.ex: The French were dealt another blow yesterday when Serge Viars withdrew from the squad.
example.tran: 昨天塞尔日·维亚尔退出该队令法国人又遭遇了一记重击。

means.word_mean: 1. method or manner of conduct in relation to others;
2. the act of transacting within or between groups (as carrying on commercial activities);
